Skill.label: Blade Fall, Use Faster casting if no essence glove
Desecrate if you go arma brand / cremation
Herald of Agony + prec if you go poison concoction

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x70FF70^x70FF70-------IMPORTANT NOTES-------- ^xE05030 You can swap to blade blast as soon as blood aquaduct if you really want to, but HIGHLY recommend getting around 40-50% cast speed on gear first and essence of insanity gloves
Keep blade fall at lvl 1 for mana cost and spell cascade at level 1 in your blade fall setup (it gives you more damage due to less blade spread)
YOU NEED EITHER A MANA FLASK OR SHAPER RING WITH +MANA ON SPELL HIT TO SUSTAIN MANA WITH BLADE BLAST
Use Chance to Poison support gem until you get 100% chance to poison without it through glove eldritch implicit / jewels
Swap out Grace for Malevolence on boss fights
You can use the covenant chest piece + mings heart if you want more damage
^x70FF70-------Leveling-------^7^x7070FF
^7Level with arma brand + cremation until maps, then swap to poison concoction until you get decent cast speed gear / shaper mana ring
If you want, you can grab poison concoction from library and level with it from there but it will probably just be worse than arma brand + cremation
^x70FF70--------Gear--------^7
^xD02090^7^xD02090Wand ^7Step 1: Get low level wands from act 1 vendor (ilvl 12 or 13) to get an easy +1 phys roll with chaos dot multi with harvest phys / chaos reroll / roll with essence of misery
^xD02090Shield ^7Harvest rerolls / essences until you get good life with spell suppression
^xD02090Helmet ^7Harvest / essences until you get good life + open suffix for ailment duration craft (random helm syndicate unveil)
^xD02090Body Armour ^7^7LOATHING essence until good life + suppression + open prefix for phys taken as fire grav veiled mod
^xD02090Gloves ^7INSANITY essence until you get good life / suppression, then roll chance to poison with eldritch currency
^xD02090Boots ^7Harvest / essences til life + suppression, open prefix for onslaught movement speed craft
^xD02090Amulet ^7Marble Amulet, caster / life / phys rerolls until you get life with +1 gems or cast speed or dot multi
^7^xD02090Shaper Ring ^7Harvest life rerolls until life + life gain on spell hit
^xD02090Hunter Ring ^7Harvest caster until life + despair on hit
^xD02090Belt ^7Harvest / Essences til life and whatever else u need
^x70FF70-------Skill Rotation------- ^7 Poachers Mark (if boss / really tanky mob) -> Withering Step -> Bladefall -> Blade Blast -> Withering step when off CD -> Keep bladefall/bladeblasting -> Plaguebearer when full (or you can take plaguebearer off when bossing)
